property.name: Lépine Lodge
property.mapCopy:
Renfrew offers the perfect balance of small-town charm and modern convenience, making it an ideal spot for families, outdoor enthusiasts, and young professionals. With its family-friendly parks, playgrounds, and excellent schools, it’s a welcoming environment for raising children. Surrounded by lush green spaces and extensive trails for walking, biking, and snowmobiling, Renfrew provides endless opportunities to enjoy nature year-round.
With their growing list of coffee shops, restaurants, events and festivals you’ll never run out of places to go, things to do and food to enjoy.
property.leasingCopy:
Finding a new home can be an exciting but also daunting experience. From comparing prices to evaluating [amenities](https://www.lepineapartments.com/newsroom/family-friendly-living), location, and overall lifestyle fit, there’s a lot to consider.

At Lépine, we offer a consultative and transparent leasing process when looking for your apartment rental, letting you make decisions at your own pace.

Our leasing team will help you understand all your options, plan your move and will be on hand to ensure your move-in goes as smoothly as possible. We give the same care and attention to your home as we do to our own. You will feel at home and carefree when you live in our Lépine apartment rentals in Renfrew.

hero.description: Start a new chapter at Lépine Lodge, located in the charming town of Renfrew. This community offers you a balance of city convenience and country comforts, with onsite community features and services that allow you to enjoy life to the fullest. These apartments are perfect for anyone starting out or for those who are selling their house and are ready to upgrade their lifestyle in the town of Renfrew.

city.name: Renfrew
city.description: The quaint township of Renfrew, Ontario is ideal for those who seek country comforts with city convenience. Enjoy the fresh air with the surrounding green spaces. And take advantage of easily accessible services and amenities.

address.tourLocation: Walk-In Tours Welcome at 459 Barnet Boulevard, Renfrew

propertySuite.copy:
Start a new chapter at Lépine Lodge, the ideal choice for apartment rentals in Renfrew.

Located in the heart of Renfrew, our apartments feature modern finishes and a [large open-concept layout](https://lepineapartments.com/newsroom/bungalow-sized-apartments), offering the perfect blend of style and comfort. With incredible amenities right outside your door, from the fully equipped fitness centre to the saltwater pool and sauna, everything you need is within reach.

Whether you’re looking for a new [apartment](https://www.lepineapartments.com/newsroom/brighter-when-you-rent) in Renfrew because you’re downsizing, relocating or looking for a fresh start, Lépine Lodge is designed to meet your needs. With proximity to local shops, restaurants and scenic outdoor spaces, you’ll have the best of Renfrew at your fingertips.

Explore your new lifestyle in an apartment at Lépine Lodge today!

listings.copy: By registering you’ll be among the first to receive access to book a leasing appointment. You can expect our team to contact you with more details on floorplans and pricing in the near future.
listings.priceRange: Shop to compare the value of a modern Lépine Apartment lifestyle in Renfrew
listings.noListingsCTA: This community is very popular. Book an appointment, and we'll help you explore your options and join a waiting list to be first in line to be notified of upcoming availabilities.
listings.contactCopy: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us to explore more options.

features.copy:
Lépine Lodge is conveniently located near shopping, wellness services, and scenic green spaces, providing an ideal blend of nature and urban convenience.

Your Renfrew apartment rental gives you access to many property features, including a fully equipped fitness center and yoga studio, a games lounge and library, a [saltwater pool](https://lepineapartments.com/newsroom/lake-side-summers-and-pool-side-winters) and sauna, and a terrace, courtyard, and communal garden to enjoy the [outdoors](https://www.lepineapartments.com/newsroom/beyond-concrete-jungles).

amenities.name: Lobby
amenities.copy: Step into the welcoming lobby—an elegant gateway to the essence of community living. From the moment you enter, you're embraced by an atmosphere of warmth and comfort.

amenities.name: Games Lounge
amenities.copy: The games lounge offers the perfect blend of entertainment and comfort for all ages. It's a space where friendships are forged, stories are shared, and a sense of community thrives.

amenities.name: Fitness Centre
amenities.copy: Cutting-edge equipment and dedicated spaces for cardio and strength training gives you the tools to elevate your fitness regime.

amenities.name: Yoga Studio
amenities.copy: Serenity meets strength in the tranquil yoga studio as you embark on a journey to a balanced and mindful lifestyle.

amenities.name: Saltwater Pool
amenities.copy: Dive into relaxation and rejuvenation at the heated saltwater pool. Whether you seek a serene morning dip or an afternoon of family fun, the pool promises a retreat for residents of all ages.

amenities.name: Sauna
amenities.copy: Relaxation meets wellness in a space designed for holistic rejuvenation. The sauna's warmth not only provides a reprieve for tired muscles but also promotes a sense of mental clarity and relaxation.

amenities.name: Change Rooms
amenities.copy: Change rooms in the fitness centre offer a seamless transition into and out of your wellness activities, making it easy to streamline your daily routine.

amenities.name: Courtyard
amenities.copy: Welcome to an inviting oasis offering a serene escape from the bustle of urban life. Step into a space where lush greenery, pathways, and seating areas converge to create a space for relaxation and community.

amenities.name: Terrace
amenities.copy: The public outdoor terrace is a vibrant outdoor space where you can barbecue with friends, enjoy the scenery, or kick back with a good book.

amenities.name: Garden Path Network
amenities.copy: The inviting garden path network’s natural beauty is deal for a leisurely morning walk, an afternoon escape, or an evening unwind.

amenities.name: Gazebo
amenities.copy: The gazebo is a versatile space that provides sheltered seating for gatherings, serene spots for quiet contemplation, or a picturesque backdrop for small events.

amenities.name: Communal Garden
amenities.copy: Embrace the joy of gardening by cultivating herbs, flowers, and vegetables in the community gardens.

amenities.name: Pickleball Court
amenities.copy: The pickleball court is a social hub where residents come together for spirited matches, laughter, and friendly competition.

amenities.name: Heated Underground Parking
amenities.copy: No more scraping ice or snow off windshields in winter; secure, well-lit, heated parking ensures a comfortable start to your journey year-round.

amenities.name: Resident Storage Lockers
amenities.copy: These secure and accessible spaces give you the freedom to declutter your living areas and store seasonal items, sports gear, or extra belongings with ease.

amenities.name: Library
amenities.copy: Welcome to your cozy haven. Whether you seek to escape into a novel or simply unwind with a magazine, our small library is a cherished retreat.

amenities.name: Recreational Vehicle Storage
amenities.copy: Say goodbye to the hassle of off-site storage facilities and hello to the convenience of having your gear close at hand, allowing you to seize every opportunity for adventure.

amenities.name: Pond
amenities.copy: The pond is an enchanting centerpiece on the landscaped grounds, cultivating a sense of peace and connection with nature.

mapItems.title: Our Lady of Fatima Catholic School

meta.description: Experience luxury living at Lépine Lodge. Luxury apartments with premium amenities, located in Renfrew.
meta.title: Luxury Living with Premium Amenities | Lépine Lodge Apartments in Renfrew

modelSuites.title: One Bedroom and Home Office
modelSuites.copy: This apartment boasts spacious living areas with ample natural light. The built-in home office cabinetry is perfect for working at home or exploring new hobbies and creative projects.

modelSuites.title: One Bedroom and Family Room
modelSuites.copy: This model features a clever layout with a den that's perfect for those who have a young family or need extra room for grandkids or guests.

modelSuites.title: 2 Bedroom
modelSuites.copy: A large two-bedroom apartment home with two full-sized bathrooms is perfect for young families or those hosting regular guests. The bedrooms are on opposite sides of the apartment which is perfect for roommates.

modelSuites.title: 2 Bed and Home Office
modelSuites.copy: This bungalow-sized apartment is perfect for people who are looking to avoid the hassles of house ownership but still want space to breathe. Lake-side summers and pool-side winters are in your future.

items: Open-concept layouts with space for home offices in select suites
Undermounted kitchen sinks complete with spray faucet
Barrier-free accessible design in select suites
Acrylic one-piece bath module with grab bars and curved shower rod
Suite heat pumps for individual temperature control

items.question: What amenities are included in my apartment rental in the building?
items.answer: Lépine Lodge offers a variety of premium amenities, including a fully equipped fitness center, games lounge, yoga studio, saltwater pool, sauna, pickleball court, change rooms, lobby, library, heated underground parking, storage lockers, recreational vehicle storage, courtyard, terrace, gazebo, garden path network and communal garden. These apartment amenities are designed to enhance your living experience and build a sense of community.

items.question: Is the building smoke free?
items.answer: Yes, all of our buildings are entirely smoke free.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Yes, pets are welcome at Lépine Apartments! We welcome your furry friends, but residents must declare any pets on their application form and follow our pet policy. [Contact our leasing team](#contact) for more details on our pet policy.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Yes, indoor heated parking and outdoor parking is available for an extra cost per month.

items.question: How do I schedule a tour of the apartments?
items.answer: To schedule a tour of our Renfrew apartment rentals, simply fill out our [contact form](#contact), give us a call or [send us an email](mailto:leasing@lepineapartments.com). Our team will happily show you around the property and help you find your new rental apartment in Renfrew.

items.question: Are there any community events or social activities for apartment residents?
items.answer: Yes, we host a variety of community events throughout the year for the [whole family](https://www.lepineapartments.com/newsroom/family-friendly-living), from fitness classes to holiday gatherings and BBQs. There’s always something happening at Lépine Lodge!

items.question: Do you offer furnished apartments?
items.answer: We currently do not offer furnished suites.

items.question: Do the apartments come with private outdoor space?
items.answer: Select suites come with a private outdoor terrace or balcony.

items.question: Are utilities included in the apartment rental?
items.answer: Utilities are an extra monthly cost and are metered separately for your convenience.

items.question: Are the apartments air conditioned?
items.answer: Yes, all suites offer individual climate-controlled heat pumps.

items.question: What types of apartments are available at Lépine Lodge?
items.answer: We offer a range of [spacious 1-bedroom apartments](https://www.lepineapartments.com/newsroom/sarahs-story-of-freedom-and-flexibility-at-lepine), 2-bedroom apartments, and 3-bedroom apartments to suit your lifestyle needs, including rental apartments with home offices. Each suite has modern finishes and open layouts to create a comfortable, spacious living space.

items.question: What is the application process like to rent an apartment?
items.answer: The application process is simple! Simply give us a call and we can either walk you through it or send you a lease application form for your apartment rental in Renfrew.

items.question: What is the lease term?
items.answer: The minimum lease term for our apartment rentals is 12 months but many of our residents sign multi-year leases. For more details or customized lease options, please [contact our leasing office](#contact).

items.question: How do I schedule a tour of the apartment?
items.answer: To schedule a tour of our Renfrew apartment rentals, simply fill out our [contact form](#contact), give us a call or [send us an email](mailto:leasing@lepineapartments.com).

items.question: What is there to do in Renfrew?
items.answer: Renfrew offers plenty to do, from outdoor activities like hiking and fishing to community events, festivals, local dining, and shopping. There's always something for everyone.

items.question: Is Renfrew a walkable town?
items.answer: Yes, with its downtown area, parks, restaurants and stores easily accessible on foot, making it convenient for daily errands and walks around town.

items.question: Is Renfrew a good place to raise a family?
items.answer: Yes, Renfrew is family-friendly with safe neighbourhoods, great schools, parks, and community events. The town also hosts many community events and festivals that create a fun community atmosphere.

items.question: What is near the Lépine Lodge?
items.answer: Lépine Lodge is conveniently located near a ton of local amenities. Just 5 minutes away, you'll find a grocery store and a variety of restaurants and coffee shops. Additionally, nearby parks, healthcare facilities, and schools provide further convenience and make it a great location for both leisure and everyday living.

items.question: What amenities and services are available in Renfrew?
items.answer: Renfrew offers grocery stores, hardware stores, schools, healthcare facilities, and restaurants and coffee shops, along with parks, trails and recreational facilities.

posts.title: A New Chapter Begins: Johanne’s Gardens Officially Opens in Carleton Place
posts.preview: Under a clear autumn sky, Lépine proudly celebrated the official opening of Johanne’s Gardens — a landmark moment marking the continued growth of our communities in the Ottawa Valley.

posts.title: Renting vs. Buying: A Closer Look at the Initial Costs
posts.preview: There’s a long-standing belief that buying a home is the ultimate financial goal. But what often gets overlooked is the significant upfront cost that comes with homeownership.

posts.title: Creating Proud Traditions: Lépine Apartments Presents the PGA TOUR Americas Commissionaires Ottawa Open
posts.preview: This summer, Lépine Apartments made our debut as the presenting sponsor of the PGA TOUR Americas Commissionaires Ottawa Open. The 2025 edition took place from July 21 to 27 at the sprawling Eagle Creek Golf Club in Dunrobin.

posts.title: Canada Strong: Building on Decades of Buying Local
posts.preview: Since our beginnings more than 60 years ago, Lépine Apartments has always been proudly Canadian. As a family-owned business, we understand the value of a good home—from the space we return to each night, to the country we all share.

posts.title: Renting Vs Buying: Why More Young Adults Are Choosing to Rent Rather Than Getting a Mortgage
posts.preview: We explore why many young adults are choosing to rent from a landlord instead of renting a house from the bank through a mortgage interest.

posts.title: Bungalow Sized Apartments for Rent in Greater Ottawa
posts.preview: Whether you’re an empty nester looking for a change of pace, or a young professional not ready to jump into the homeowners market quite yet, you have more options than ever with spacious Lépine rental apartments popping up all around Greater Ottawa in Kanata, Carleton Place, Smiths Falls, Renfrew and more!

posts.title: Why Rent a Lépine Apartment?
posts.preview: Apartment homes are popping up all over the Ottawa area and are offering an upgraded lifestyle to those who want to enjoy the comforts of home without the hassle or financial hurdles of homeownership.

posts.title: Empowering Northern Communities
posts.preview: Les Terrasses Francesca was built on land that had formerly belonged to the Franciscan Missionaries of Mary, a former convent.

posts.title: Sponsoring Champions: Lépine Partners with Wheelchair Basketball Canada’s Schools Program
posts.preview: Lépine proudly sponsors Wheelchair Basketball Canada’s Schools Program, promoting inclusion, accessibility, and careers in the trades for youth across Ontario.

posts.title: Maximize the value you get for your money when you rent a Lépine Apartment
posts.preview: While many real estate companies are increasing prices, Lépine stands out by increasing value for your money. Here are five ways a modern apartment builder like Lépine adds value to the lives of their residents.

posts.title: Family-Friendly Living: Exploring Lépine Apartments' Amenities
posts.preview: Finding the perfect home for your family involves more than just square footage and location—it's about creating a nurturing environment where your children can thrive and make lasting memories.

posts.title: The Future’s Much Brighter When You Rent
posts.preview: In the race of Canadian real estate, many hardworking families find themselves stranded, feeling the opportunity for homeownership slipping out of reach. Families shouldn’t have to risk their hard-earned capital on unsuitable homes just to meet societal standards. Affordable family-sized rentals exist in Ottawa’s most desired neighborhoods, ensuring families can live comfortably today while investing in their future dreams.

posts.title: Barrier-Free by Design: Lépine Apartments Offer Certified Accessible Living
posts.preview: At Lépine Apartments, we believe that everyone deserves equal access and opportunity. We’re committed to helping create a more inclusive Canada, one apartment community at a time.

posts.title: Capital Gains - How to Optimize Real Estate Investments!
posts.preview: The recent federal budget announcement includes a significant change to the capital gains inclusion rate, which has increased from 50% to 66.6%. This presents a unique opportunity for real estate owners.

posts.title: Breaking Barriers on the Slopes: Lépine Apartments' Support for Canadian Adaptive Disabled Snowsports (CADS)
posts.preview: Lépine Apartments has always believed in a hands-on approach to business and charitable endeavors. It comes as no surprise that many of the company's philanthropic ventures have a personal connection. When choosing charitable initiatives, Lépine Apartments prioritizes causes that resonate with their values and experiences. That's why the decision to join Canadian Adaptive Disabled Snowsports (CADS) in their efforts to provide people with physical challenges the chance to experience the joys of winter sports without barriers was an easy one.

posts.title: Sarah's Story of Freedom and Flexibility at Lépine
posts.preview: When Sarah first set out on her own, the social pressures to buy a house were immense. It seemed like homeownership was the ultimate goal, acting as a symbol of stability and future financial success. More young people have begun to question this narrative, including Sarah.

posts.title: She Chose Freedom and Flexibility
posts.preview: When I first set out on my own, the social pressure to buy a house was immense. It was understood that homeownership was the ultimate goal, a symbol of stability and future financial success. But I questioned this narrative.

posts.title: Honouring Our Armed Forces Veterans
posts.preview: Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) veterans demonstrate to us the epitome of courage, altruism, leadership, integrity and perseverance.

posts.title: Built to Last. Built for Life
posts.preview: Lépine’s premium apartment homes are built and designed with sustainability and efficiency in mind.

posts.title: Helping All Canadians Realize the Benefits of Sport
posts.preview: Francis Lépine has always used an extremely hands-on approach in business, so it should come with no surprise that many of our charitable ventures have a personal connection.

posts.title: Restoring Camp Otonabee
posts.preview: Since 1952, children and youth have been enjoying the beautiful outdoors along the Ottawa River at Camp Otonabee.

posts.title: An Unforgettable Day at the Lépine Lodge Open House: A Perfect Blend of Luxury and Country Festivities
posts.preview: As I approached the entrance of Lépine Lodge on June 24th, the atmosphere was full of excitement. The combination of a country festival ambiance and the promise of a tour of this new apartment community had me brimming with anticipation.

posts.title: Protecting Our Urban Forests
posts.preview: Maintaining and growing our urban forests is essential for a healthy city.

posts.title: Energy Efficient at Home: Lépine Apartments Optimize Your Life
posts.preview: Lépine Apartments has more than 60 years’ experience designing luxury rental buildings. We know what works and what provides the optimal living experience for our residents.

posts.title: Lépine Lodge’s Valley-Themed Open House
posts.preview: Dress in your best denim and diamonds and come prepared to experience a country festival atmosphere while touring this new apartment community!

testimonials.name: Jude and Yvonne
testimonials.copy: We were just starstruck by the place. It’s so quiet and safe. It’s a good space, we’ve got two bedrooms and an office. It’s really convenient and comfortable! They’ve got a full sized gym which is kind of awesome. You really get to relax and do the things that you really like within the building. We finally have a place to call our own!

testimonials.name: Leslie and Rick
testimonials.copy: It was just the perfect time for us. I didn’t enjoy the driveway anymore; I hated the grass. Living at Lepine gives you so much more time and freedom. We can’t wipe the smiles off our faces!

testimonials.name: John and Christine
testimonials.copy: I’ve been a homeowner since I was 23 years old. I didn’t want to do the same thing; look after a house for ever and ever. I wanted to travel a little more, I just wanted some freedom, and now I get to choose what I want to do not what I have to do.

testimonials.name: Orville and Claudette
testimonials.copy: Our family consists of 21 children and grandchildren. Our new suite is big enough to have everyone over at once, it’s amazing!

testimonials.name: Stephanie
testimonials.copy: We wanted to save while living in something fancier than a standard apartment.  This is condo-style living. Life is much simpler when everything is either close by or included in our rent.

testimonials.name: Coco and Sylvia
testimonials.copy: It’s like living in a luxury resort here! A vacation always ends, but when we come home from travelling it feels like we’ve just extended our vacation to a different resort!

testimonials.name: Larry and Diane
testimonials.copy: If we had known earlier that this type of product existed in Ottawa, we wouldn’t have tried to keep our house for as long as we did!

contactUs.subtitle: Get in touch with a Lepine Specialist Today

leasingSteps.header: Your Peace of Mind Is Top of Mind
leasingSteps.copy: Finding a new home should be an experience full of excitement and anticipation. However, shopping to compare value for money can be daunting. The Lepine leasing process is consultative and transparent and lets you make decisions at your own pace. We'll help you understand all your options, help you plan your move, and will be on hand to ensure your move-in goes as smoothly as possible. We give the same care and attention to your home as we do to our own because we own and operate our apartments. You will feel at home and carefree when you live in a Lépine apartment.

instagramPosts.caption:
We’re proud to see our brand ambassador, Drake Batherson sit down with Ian Mendes and Jackson Starr on the NHL Absolute Non-Sens Podcast to share his experience behind the scenes during the filming of our commercials!

It’s always great to see our partnerships come to life through genuine stories and shared laughs.

#OttawaSenators #Senators #DrakeBatherson #Ottawa #OttawaApartments #ApartmentRentals

A morning of insight, connection, and inspired living at our Fall Rightsizing Brunch. Guests joined us for a thoughtful conversation with industry experts:

Larry Mohr, COO of Engel & Volkers Ottawa, discussed Smart Downsizing: Understanding Market Trends & Maximizing Your Equity
Martha Tobin, Founder of Declutter4Good on Declutter with Joy: Letting Go Without Losing Your Mind
Aaron Dobby, Leasing Agent at Lépine Apartments, shares exclusive insight into our newest community, Carré Saint Louis

Attendees enjoyed a beautifully catered brunch from Grenfell Catering, followed by a custom flower bar to create an elegant bouquet to take home with them.

Thank you to everyone who attended!

#Apartments #ApartmentLiving #RightsizingBrunch #Kanata #KanataApartments #ApartmentRentals

At Johanne’s Gardens in Carleton Place, every detail has been crafted to create a sense of calm and connection. Spacious, open-concept layouts are paired with warm, natural light and refined finishes that are both elegant and inviting. 

Thoughtful planning ensures every space has a purpose, from cozy corners for quiet moments to bright, airy rooms made for gathering. Here, modern living is effortless, stylish, and deeply comfortable, a true reflection of what home should feel like.

#JohannesGardens #CarletonPlace #ApartmentLiving #CarletonPlaceApartments

Step into Autumn in Kanata, bringing vibrant streets, cool breezes, and the promise of cozy nights ahead. Our thoughtfully designed apartments offer the perfect balance of comfort, style, and community, a place where you can relax, connect, and truly feel at home. Whether you’re sipping your morning coffee on the balcony or exploring the nearby parks and trails, Kanata living makes every moment feel effortlessly enjoyable.

#Apartments #ApartmentLiving #Autumn #Kanata #KanataApartments #ApartmentRentals #Ottawa

Johanne’s Gardens is Now Open!

A heartfelt thank you to everyone who joined us for the ribbon-cutting ceremony celebrating the opening of Johanne’s Gardens, our newest Lépine Apartments community in Carleton Place.

The event was marked by a special ribbon-cutting led by President and Master Builder France Lépine, followed by light refreshments and guided tours of the new residences. We were thrilled to welcome members of the community as well as our business partners. Your support made this milestone even more meaningful.

Want to learn more about Lépine Apartments in Carleton Place? 
Email us at leasing@lepineapartments.com
Or call 1-888-453-7463

#JohannesGardens #CarletonPlace #RibbonCutting #WeBuildCommunity #ApartmentLiving #CarletonPlaceApartments

Golden fall foliage framed the perfect backdrop for an exclusive evening at 503 Luxe.

Our 503 Luxe preview event offered an exclusive first look at the penthouse model suite at Saint Emilion, setting the tone for what residents can expect at Carré Saint Louis, Kanata’s most anticipated new address, opening Spring 2026.

Guests experienced a preview of the thoughtfully designed interiors, premium finishes, and elevated details that define the Carré Saint Louis lifestyle. The evening featured curated cocktails, light bites, and sweeping terrace views, all in a relaxed and elegant atmosphere.

It was a pleasure to connect with future residents and community members, and to share our vision for a new standard of luxury in the heart of Kanata.

Thank you to everyone who joined us and made the evening so memorable.

#Apartments #ApartmentLiving #PreviewEvent #Kanata #KanataApartments #ApartmentRentals

Rent vs Own? 

Increasingly, working professionals in Ottawa are choosing to rent, and it’s not just about affordability. It’s about freedom, flexibility, and lifestyle. Swipe to learn more about how the Lépine Lifestyle could be the right fit for you. 

Connect with us! Email leasing@lepineapartments.com or call 1-888-453-7463 

#ApartmentRentals #RentVsOwn #LepineApartments #ApartmentRentals #OttawaApartments #LiveItUpAtLepine

Welcome back, Drake! We're so glad to see you back on home ice tonight. The entire Lépine team is behind you and the rest of the team as you take the ice. 

Wishing you a strong, successful season ahead! 

#OttawaSenators #Senators #DrakeBatherson #OttawaApartments #ApartmentRentals @drakebatherson9

A heartfelt tribute at the Ottawa Senators Home Opener, where the crowd at Canadian Tire Centre honoured Émile Benoit Joseph Lépine, President France Lépine’s son, who sadly passed away last spring. Senators Alumni, Chris Phillips, presented France with a custom “Émile” jersey, along with Émile’s favourite jersey, beautifully displayed in a commemorative frame. The Lépine family also wore special Senators jerseys bearing “Émile” and “00”, a heartfelt nod to his birth year and enduring connection to the team. Émile, a devoted Sens fan, will always be part of our team. 

Thank you to all who joined us in recognizing Émile Lépine’s memory alongside the Lépine family.

From hosting gatherings to focused workouts, every space at Johanne’s Gardens reflects a sense of style and purpose. Featuring red retro-inspired appliances by Premiere Appliances in the party room and complementary red fitness equipment, these amenities mix thoughtful design and functionality. 

Come see for yourself! Email leasing@lepineapartments.com or call 1-888-453-7463 to book a tour.

#JohannesGardens #CarletonPlace #WeBuildCommunity #ApartmentLiving #CarletonPlaceApartments

You're invited to the official ribbon-cutting ceremony for Johanne's Gardens, our newest apartment community in Carleton Place!

When: Saturday, October 18, 2025, from 1:30 PM to 3:00 PM 
Where: 277 Coleman Street, Carleton Place

Enjoy light refreshments, guided tours, and the chance to connect with community leaders, local businesses, and future neighbours.

Click the link in our bio to RSVP and help us celebrate this exciting new chapter for Carleton Place.

#JohannesGardens #CarletonPlace #RibbonCutting #WeBuildCommunity #ApartmentLiving #CarletonPlaceApartments

We’re thrilled to announce that the final concrete pour at Johanne’s Gardens is now complete! This crucial rooftop pour secures the elevator shaft for the final building, marking a significant milestone in the overall construction process.

With Building D already open and welcoming residents, and the remaining two buildings progressing steadily, the vision of Johanne’s Gardens is quickly becoming a reality. Each milestone brings us closer to delivering a vibrant, modern, and connected community that future residents will be proud to call home.

Stay tuned as we continue to transform this development from blueprint to neighbourhood, one exciting milestone at a time!

#CarletonPlace #CarletonPlaceApartments #Apartments #WeBuildCommunity #ApartmentConstruction #Construction

Fall colours and summer heat, an October plot twist we didn’t see coming! With temperatures hitting 30°C this week, The Normand terrace has become the perfect spot to enjoy an iced pumpkin spice latte from our friends at Morning Owl while taking in the views of the golden leaves. 

Even with the warmth, the fall colours are starting to show, creating the perfect backdrop for a peaceful coffee break!

#Apartments #ApartmentLiving #Fall #Autumn #FallFoliage #Kanata #KanataApartments

You're Invited to 503 Luxe: An Exclusive Preview Event

Step inside our beautifully designed penthouse model suite at Saint Emilion and get a first look at what life will feel like at Carré Saint Louis: Kanata’s most anticipated new address, opening Spring 2026.

The space is a preview of the elevated design, modern finishes, and refined living you can expect at Carré Saint Louis. 

Enjoy an evening of cocktails, light bites, and terrace views, while touring the model suite and connecting with our leasing team in an elegant, relaxed atmosphere.

Where: Saint Emilion – Penthouse Model Suite 503
1136 Maritime Way, Kanata
When: Thursday, October 16 | 5:30 PM – 7:30 PM

Spots are limited. Click the link in our bio to RSVP today

Discover the future of luxury living in Kanata.

#CarreSaintLouis #Kanata #ApartmentRentals #KanataRentals #503Luxe #KanataApartments

With each milestone, Carré Saint Louis reveals more of its character. The graceful arches and refined façade, inspired by European design, reflect a commitment to craftsmanship and timeless beauty. As construction advances, these architectural details will create a residence where modern living blends with classic charm. 

Now pre-leasing, click the link in our bio to learn more! 

#CarreSaintLouis #Kanata #ApartmentConstruction #ApartmentRentals #KanataRentals #ConstructionUpdate
